definitions.definition: Now only in the phrase in a trice : a very short time ; the blink of an eye , an instant , a moment .

main_definition: Now only in the phrase in a trice : a very short time ; the blink of an eye , an instant , a moment .

definitions.definition: A pulley , a windlass ( “ form of winch for lifting heavy weights , comprising a cable or rope wound around a cylinder ” ) .

main_definition: ( obsolete , rare ) A pulley , a windlass ( “ form of winch for lifting heavy weights , comprising a cable or rope wound around a cylinder ” ) .
